phrases: Sorry for calling you out on such short notice.
I did not expect Menma's father would get in the way.
That is exactly why we are going there now.
We can corner Menma's mom while her dad is away.
Her mom will definitely side with us.
She even gave us Menma's diary.
I am sure she would do anything for Menma.
If she knew I went to her house again without telling her anything...
I am sure she would be angry.
Wow, Atsumu and Chiriko came too this time.
I am so happy to see you.
I have got a good feeling about this.
So is this about the rocket firework?
I was surprised when my husband first told me about it.
But I think it is great.
And you come up with fun ideas.
It is the same as when you were little.
Yeah, when we were kids we actually planned to make fireworks with Menma.
If we could launch fireworks, I think that Menm... I mean, Meiko would also be happy.
So we would like you to ask your husband...
You all sure do get along well.
She was left out by her friends.
You may talk about what Meiko would enjoy, but really you are just having fun yourselves.
And yet you all go on the same as always...
Were not you playing with Meiko on that day?
You read her diary did not you?
She is the only one who has not changed since then.
But why have you all grown up?
Why is Meiko the only one...
Maybe she is resented us all this time.
This might be the first time someone has hated me this strongly since I was born.
She is a parent after all.
Let us drop this foolishness about Menma's wish already.
If we do that we do not know what will happen to Menm...
Everyone has been playing along with poor pitiful you.
I took it too far myself, so I cannot exactly judge others in that regard.
But unlike you, I do not force my own pain onto others.
Is not that the right way to put it?
You are obsessed with the past, and even Menma's parents are like that...
He was talking about himself was not he?
The one who is in pain is Yukiatsu.
I will grant it on my own.
But you said that all of us together have to...
I had thought that everyone had changed.
But once I spoke to everyone, I was surprised that no one had changed all that much.
But no matter how little we change, we are not all together anymore.
We never were from the start.
Since all of us together do not exist anymore, it is all the same if I grant the wish on my own.
I will keep helping like I have been, so we can...
I was taking my shoes off.
I can grant it even if I am alone.
You signed up for even more hours?
That is because I have not slept.
All I did with my life until now was sleep and eat.
I have built up a big sleep surplus.
How can he put so much energy into it?
Does he care about Menma that much?
You must be in a lot of pain too.
I still have work to do.
I did not want you to go back then either.
I am going to tell you something terrible about myself now.
Back then, I was actually relieved.
You said that you did not like Menma.
It is horrible of me, but I was actually kind of happy.
It was the same as you saying you loved her.
That moment has pained me ever since.
I could not forgive myself for being happy then.
Or for hurting Menma, and for how it all ended.
And I... I could not forgive myself for liking you.
But it turns out that I... I really...
Say that Menma really is at your house, if you grant her wish, will not she disappear?
Are you fine with her disappearing, even though you like her?
I will clean them off with toothpicks!
You really do not have to.
Once I grant her wish, Menma will...
Sorry about that, bear it for just a bit more.
But if that is what Menma wants...
If that is the way it is, I will...
No I... I remembered The Dog of Flanders.
They were showing a rebroadcast of The Dog of Flanders a while back...
This is such a crappy lie.
I am sure that Patrasche was happy!
Because Nello was really, really nice to him.
Menma's mother continues to hate us because she lost Menma.
No one is being saved from their sense of guilt.
I am the only being saved by Menma.
I have to get to work...
Oh, you are going to school?
If I am the only one who can see Menma,
then I have a duty to fulfill her wish.
He did not say a thing about me not going to school.
I thought that maybe he would gotten fed up with me.
Oh, if it is about your job then do not worry.
Oh, no way, what is it then?
Oh, about going to the Honmas?
After all, I could not tell what you were apologizing about.
I cannot believe Jintan left without even saying good morning.
No matter how Menma's mom reacted, we cannot leave Jintan to do everything on his own.
And here I would thought the Super Peace Busters had finally gotten back together.
Even if Jintan is the only one who can see her, and even if no one else believes in her, I will...
You are getting silent phone calls?
Hey, Yadomi is at work right?
You do not think he is?
The caller ID showed Yadomi's home phone number.
There was a kind of scraping, sandy noise.
This might sound silly, but what if it was not Yadomi...
I wish Anjou would not take days off without saying anything.
Did she say anything to you?
I had plans for muscle party with everyone from the gym today.
I wonder how I should act towards Anaru.
When I see her next time.
I am sorry about what happened.
No, I am the one who should be sorry for intruding on your home...
My mom usually does not leave the house.
I think she does not want to see other people.
I think it is hard for her because my sister passed away.
Or how could I put it... it is embarrassing to have a mother like that.
What in the world are parents thinking.
But I think it is hardest for them.
Anyway, you do not have to tell me all this.
They still have another child left.
I was still a little kid, so I do not really remember my sister.
But there are a few things I do remember.
But you know, I am in the Super Peace Busters!
I am going to protect world peace!
So you stay here and protect the house.
She told me to protect the house.
But who would want something from that stingy dump.
What have you been doing today?
I got a silent phone call around 5 of the clock.
Are you going to say it was Menma again?
My dad and I were both out of the house then, so maybe Menma really did...
Why do not you show her to me too.
Show her to me if she is!
You are keeping this act about seeing Menma's ghost even now.
The things we did to Menma will not fade for the rest of our lives.
Menma apologizing to us is a lie.
There is no way that Menma could forgive us.
Today I played at the secret fort with everyone who had grown up.
The Super Peace Busters should always get along.
We still do not know the name of the flower we saw that day.
kimi to korogasu tsukaisute no jitensha
umi wo miwatasu saka wo kakenobotte
souyatte i am about to wa boku no hou e
mada futari wa sugu soko ni irunoni
kimi to korogasu tsukaisute no jitensha
umi wo miwatasu saka wo kakenobotte
souyatte i am about to wa boku no hou e
mada futari wa sugu soko ni irunoni
Upon pages and pages of entries
We have put down all our emotions
But now I have hit a writer's block
I do not know how to finish this page anymore
Putting a bookmark in my diary
You and I go out to ride the bike we found in the dumpster
Let us go to our secret place
Where we piled up our bricks of memories
Run up the hill, where we can see the horizon
Where we can see the sky so fearfully blue
With cider in my right hand
My other hand helps me search for you
You used to come find me way back when
You used to demand me of so much more
You are both still standing right by my side
Yet why do I pray to see you both again?
There must be something off with me

There must be something off with me
futari no himitsu no kichi no naka
kimi to natsu no owari shourai no yume ookina kibou wasurenai
jyuunen no ato hachigatsu mata deaeru no wo shinjite
kimi ga saigo made kokoro kara arigatou sakendeita koto shitetayo
I will never forget the hopes and dreams we shared during that one summer's end.
I am sure we will meet again in another August, in maybe ten years time.
I could feel your heartfelt thanks all the way until the end.
And I know it must have been painful
to hold back your tears and say goodbye with a smile.
But those are my best memories.
